name: 2013-14 NBA Season Guide - Kyrie cover.
description:
NOTE: The Kyrie Irving cover pictured here is exclusive to the printed version of our 2013-14 Season Guide.

-- -- --

The skinny: 60 pages of pro hoops goodness.

Inside: All you need to know about every NBA team heading into the 2013-14 campaign, including LeBron's date with destiny, the greatness of the San Antonio Spurs, Kevin Durant's mastery of the elements, the wild and entertaining Cavaliers' offseason and much, much more.

For a complete look at what's on offer, check out: http://issuu.com/bucketsmagazine/ â€¨docs/seasonguide201314

-- -- --

The magazine is ad free, hence the cover price. With no revenue being generated from ad support, our online store print edition RRP (set to $20.00) has been created to cover the costs of printing per unit.

-- -- --

If you're interested in placing a bulk purchase, for retail or other means, please contact the Publisher, Brad Graham to discuss large order rates and shipping details / deadlines.

-- -- --

Please allow up to 21 days for the delivery of your publication. Magazine will be printed on demand.

Dimensions: 8.5" x 11" (22 x 28cm). 
Length: 60 pages (including covers).

name: BUCKETS: Launch Issue - His Airness.
description:
Available again for a limited time only, our Launch Issue comes complete with a massive celebration of his Airness, as well as features on the Miami Heatles, Rajon Rondo, Kevin Durant, John Wall, the '92 Dream Team and stacks more.

--------------

Grab your copy before they're all sold out.

--------------
